name: Bolt 2016
description:
Graduation Video Game
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

In Bolt, 2 players play as robots able to send a lightning ball to each other. The ball inflicts damage to whatever it goes through, gaining size as it is thrown. The ball allows the robots to progress through the dungeon in a positioning- and cooperation-based gameplay.

Platform: PC / Engine: Unity 5
Number of players: 2

Producer : Grégory CASSINI
Game Design : Adrien BARIAU and Vincent RIGITANO
Game Art : Xavier D'ESPINAY SAINT LUC, Thomas GOUBIER and Jonathan LOOSVELD
Game Design & Programming : Frédéric WAX
Game Programming : Alexandre TRAN
Music & Sound Design : Terence TOUSSAINT
